wikipedia_page.main: John Laurence Pritchard (25 February 1885 – 23 April 1968) was a British mathematician and writer specialising in works on aviation. He also wrote detective novels and works about criminology using the pseudonym John Laurence.

response: *John Laurence Pritchard (1885–1968), British mathematician and writer
**John Laurence Pritchard, 83, British mathematician and writer specialising in works on aviation
